group_1.textLeft: Nice job, Hotori! Ya beat it all by yourself!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...! Thank you, Ayame...
This...is the first time I've beat a Witch on@my own...!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah, you did great!

group_1.textRight: You're amazing, Ayame...
We're the same age, but you're so strong@and cool...
You're like "Pink-senpai"...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I know that one! That's from the show@on Sunday mornings, right?!

group_1.textRight: You watch it too...?!@Dragon Knight Squad Draranger...!

group_1.textLeft: Yup, that's right!
"Pink-senpai"? The hero whose color is pink?

group_1.textRight: Yes, Dragoon Pink...!
I love that show! I've always wanted to be@a strong hero...!

group_1.textLeft: I see, so that's why you're working so hard.
That's very noble of you.

group_1.textRight: Ugh...it's kind of embarrassing...

group_1.textLeft: It's nothing to be ashamed of.
The higher your goal, the harder you can@work to achieve it.
Yeah!

group_1.textRight: Then...are you strong because you have@a goal too, Ayame?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you can call me Pink-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Oh, okay...

group_1.textLeft: As for me...well...
I wanna be strong so I can be with@Konoha and Hazuki!

group_1.textRight: Does that mean you don't get to spend@much time with them...?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, we're together all the time!

group_1.textRight: Then...you've reached your goal, haven't you...?

group_1.textLeft: Huh, I guess so...?

group_1.textRight: Hmm... Maybe you have other goals that you@just didn't realize...?

group_1.textLeft: Goals...goals...

group_1.textRight: Ayame, what do you want to do in the future?@You've been reading books about that, right?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno, I'm still thinkin'â€”

group_1.textCenter: Yes, we wish to reduce the ignorance towards@Magical Girls, and lessen the number who contract.
As well as save existing Magical Girls from@their eventual fate.
To that end, we believe that it is necessary to@inform the world about Magical Girls.
And...hearin' that Nayuta's workin' for the@sake of all Magical Girls...
I thought it was super cool!
(I wish I could be like Nayuta and do@somethin' for everybody.)
(I feel like I can be of more use to@Hazuki and Konoha...!)

group_1.textLeft: ...I wanna do somethin' good for everyone...@I guess?

group_1.textRight: Do you mean, something like...a hero...?!

group_1.textLeft: Heh, maybe!
...Now then, is today's request considered@complete?

group_1.textRight: Yes...! Thank you so much!
Here...this is the Grief Seed from the Witch@we just defeated.

group_1.textLeft: You can go ahead and use it first.@We'll use the remainder of it.

group_1.textRight: Oh, okay...!

group_1.textLeft: Well then, we'll accept it now.
We look forward to working with you again.

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Me too...!

group_1.textLeft: See ya around, Hotori!
